attributes.action: NHS staff are given a pay rise that reflects there worth to the Country
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to ensure that the pay and conditions of Within the NHS will both retain and attract Staff. At present there is no certainty that the current arrangements will do this.
attributes.background:
Parliament should debate the role of the NHS during the pandemic and 
its role in the future regarding the wellbeing and prosperity of the country

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
